mapper.select:
select p.man_endTime from manufacture_process p where 1=1 and p.proc_code = ( select DISTINCT proc_code from process_flowInfo where proc_index= ( select proc_index from process_flowInfo where podt_Code = #{podtCode} and proc_code = #{procCode} ) -1 and podt_code= #{podtCode}
) and com_code = ( select COM_CODE from manufacture_command_d where podt_code =#{podtCode} )
select PROC_INDEX from process_flowInfo where podt_code = #{podtCode} and proc_Code = #{procCode}

select nvl(to_char(man_starttime),0) as manStarttime, proc_code, com_code, man_qnt from manufacture_process where proc_code = (select DISTINCT PROC_CODE from process_flowInfo where proc_index = ( select PROC_INDEX from process_flowInfo where podt_code = #{podtCode} and proc_Code = #{procCode} ) +1 and podt_code = #{podtCode} ) and com_code = #{comCode}
mapper.update: update manufacture_process set man_starttime = sysdate where proc_code = 'PROC001' and com_code = #{comCode}
mapper.select:
select c.man_startTime as manStarttime, c.man_endTime as manEndtime, c.man_qnt, d.fac_code, prod_detail(d.fac_code) as facName, d.proc_code, prod_detail(d.proc_code) as procName, e.man_goalperday as manGoalPerday from manufacture_process c join (select a.fac_no, a.fac_code, b.proc_code from facility_status a join facility_process b on a.fac_no = b.fac_no where a.fac_status='Y') d on c.proc_code = d.proc_code join manufacture_command_d e on c.podt_Code = e.podt_code where c.com_Code = #{comCode}
group by c.man_startTime, c.man_endTime, c.man_qnt, d.fac_code, d.proc_code, e.man_goalperday order by d.proc_Code

select p.man_qnt from manufacture_process p where 1=1 and p.proc_code = ( select DISTINCT proc_code from process_flowInfo where proc_index= ( select proc_index from process_flowInfo where podt_Code =#{podtCode} and proc_code = #{procCode} ) -1 and podt_code=#{podtCode}
) and com_code = ( select COM_CODE from manufacture_command_d where podt_code = #{podtCode} )
mapper.insert: insert into manufacture_process (MAN_NO, PROC_CODE , COM_CODE, MAN_STARTTIME, MAN_ENDTIME , MAN_GOALQNT , MAN_QNT , PODT_CODE , EMP_NO, MAN_DATE) values ( (select 'PR'|| to_Char(Sysdate, 'yyMMdd') || (lpad( (select SUBSTR( nvl (max(man_no),'PR' || to_char(sysdate, 'yyMMdd') || '000'),9,3) from manufacture_process) +1,3,'0')) as manNo from dual), #{procCode}, (select com_code from manufacture_command_d where podt_code = #{podtCode}), null, null, (select man_goalperday from manufacture_command_d where podt_code = #{podtCode}), null, #{podtCode}, null, (select man_startdate from manufacture_command_d where com_code = (select com_code from manufacture_command_d where podt_code = #{podtCode})) )
mapper.select: select DISTINCT trunc(((a.fac_output/a.fac_runtime)/60)/6) as qntPer10Second from facility_status a join facility_process b on a.fac_no = b.fac_no where a.fac_status='Y' and b.proc_code = #{procCode}
select a.fac_no, a.fac_code, trunc(((a.fac_output/a.fac_runtime)/60)/6) as qntPer10Second, b.proc_code from facility_status a join facility_process b on a.fac_no = b.fac_no where a.fac_status='Y'

select MAN_NO, PROC_CODE, COM_CODE , MAN_STARTTIME , MAN_ENDTIME, MAN_GOALQNT, nvl(MAN_QNT,0) as manQnt, PODT_CODE, EMP_NO, MAN_DATE from manufacture_process where man_starttime is not null and MAN_ENDTIME is null order by proc_Code
select a.proc_code, b.com_code from process_flowInfo a join manufacture_command_d b on a.podt_code = b.podt_code where a.podt_code = #{podtCode} order by a.proc_index

select c.podt_code, prod_detail(c.podt_code) as podtName, c.proc_index, d.fac_code, prod_detail(d.fac_code) as facName, d.proc_code, prod_detail(d.proc_code) as procName, e.com_code, e.man_goalperday as manGoalPerday from process_flowInfo c join ( select a.fac_no, a.fac_code, b.proc_code from facility_status a join facility_process b on a.fac_no = b.fac_no where a.fac_status='Y') d on c.proc_code = d.proc_code join manufacture_command_d e on c.podt_Code = e.podt_code where c.podt_code = #{podtCode} group by c.podt_code, d.fac_code, d.proc_code, e.man_goalperday, c.proc_index, e.com_code order by c.proc_index
select podt_code, prod_detail(podt_code) podtName, man_startdate, man_goalperday, com_code from man_command_view where man_startdate = to_date(#{manStartDate}, 'rr/MM/dd')
